entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @JoeBiden Yes @POTUS is the worst American President this country had ever had!!! In 50 years people are going to look back at this President and say OMG what a incompetent and no empathy for the over 100,000 Americans who couldn't beat COVID-19 and passed away!!! AMERICANS ARE DYING!!!!
